title: Coronation Street spoilers: Dev discovers Asha's secret tonight
text:
Dev discovers Asha’s secret (Picture: ITV)

Asha Alahan (Tanisha Gorey) has been bleaching her skin in Coronation Street, but the truth is set to come to light in tonight’s episode as Dev (Jimmi Harkishin) discovers what his daughter has been up to.

For several months now, Asha has been suffering from low self-esteem and confidence in her image and, as a result, she’s been using skin-lightening cream. Dev has been none-the-wiser about what his daughter is doing to herself, and in the latest episodes, we saw her resort to extreme measures in order to purchase more of the product when she stole her dad’s credit card.

Upon realising that it was Asha who’d taken his credit card, Dev was fuming, and thus grounded her — having no clue about what’s really going on.

Tonight, the rehearsals for the school play get underway, but when Pastal-Blue gets wind of the fact that Asha went out on a date with Corey, she launches herself at Asha, and proceeds to call her horrible names. Feeling humiliated, Asha promptly exits.

Mary (Patti Clare) informs Dev about Asha’s lack of confidence, and Dev is taken aback. Later, a parcel arrives addressed to Asha, and — with Mary’s words weighing on his mind — Dev proceeds to open said parcel — and he’s devastated to discover a bottle of skin lightening cream.

After confronting Asha on the matter, Dev orders his daughter to roll up her sleeves — and he’s left shocked by her red raw skin.

How will Dev react?

Will the father and daughter work together to overcome this?

Coronation Street continues on Friday 4th October at 7:30pm on ITV.

description: Asha's secret is out — but how will Dev react?
